speaker: President. –
english: President. – The next item is the report by Mr Hutchinson, on behalf of the Committee on Development, on ‘more and better cooperation: the 2006 EU aid effectiveness package’ ( 2006/2208 (INI) ) ( A6-0270/2006 ).

agenda_item: Towards more and better EU Aid: the 2006 aid effectiveness package (debate)
